name: secskills
description: Comprehensive offensive security toolkit with 16 production-ready skills and 6 specialized subagents for penetration testing, red teaming, cloud security, mobile security, Web3 auditing, and reconnaissance. Covers web apps, Active Directory, Linux/Windows privilege escalation, network services, containers, passwords, APIs, mobile pentesting, cloud security, wireless attacks, phishing, persistence, and Web3/smart contracts.
